attributes.action: update the threashold to £500000 before anyone starts to pay inheritance Tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at present in the South Of England , London and many other areas of the U.K many people are caught by Inheritance Tax because of the high cost of housing. There is a need for money to be passed onto siblings to enable them to buy a house or they will become reliant on renting a property and the housing market will be back to the 1960's where most houses were rented and landlords became rich.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
